Utkarsh Kasana

I write in Javascript and I specialize in AngularJS and React. I write code that conforms to industry standards and semantic best practices. I am able to transform static artwork into pixel prefect, interactive and fully functional interfaces. I also speak to databases and make servers do stuff. I like working on scalability, performance, reusability, and great user experiences.

I completed my Bachelors in Computer Science from JIIT, Noida, U.P, India and my Masters from RIT, Rochester, N.Y, USA.
